thread.title: Michaels: Creatology Kids’ Color-in Playhouses ONLY $10 (Regularly $29.99) – SO FUN!
thread.title_full: Michaels: Creatology Kids’ Color-in Playhouses ONLY $10 (Regularly $29.99) – SO FUN!

author: Erica (Silly Sidekick)
title: Michaels: Creatology Kids’ Color-in Playhouses ONLY $10 (Regularly $29.99) – SO FUN!
text:
Kids’ Color-in Playhouses – Lowest Price of the Season! 
Through March 25th, Michaels is offering up Kids’ Color-in Playhouses made by Creatology with movable doors for ONLY $10 (regularly $29.99)! Note that there are 2 available styles to choose from. These are SUPER cute and would make for a sweet Birthday gift OR are great to grab to entertain the kids through Spring Break!
